title: Yukionna to Kani wo Kuu
overview: One summer day, a young man, Kita (Shigeoka Milking), who has no money and nowhere to live, tried to commit suicide, but could not take the last step. Hesitating between life and death, he saw a program about gourmet food on TV, and realizing that he had never eaten crabs in his life, he decided that "on my last day on this Earth, I will eat crabs." However, China needs money to implement its plan. After following a woman Yukieda Ayame (Iriyama Noriko), who lives in a prestigious area, he made his way to her house and demanded money, however ... everything did not go according to plan.
